generated_text:
- person: A person wearing a red top and white pants is walking on the sidewalk.
- building: The image shows multiple buildings, including a pinkish building with shops and a more ornate building in the background.
- sidewalk: The paved area where the person is walking is a sidewalk, bordered by a curb.
- road: The cobblestone surface in front of the buildings and extending into the distance is a road.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible on the left side and in the background on the right.
- car: A dark blue car is parked on the right side of the road.
- truck: A white truck is parked on the far right side of the image.
